description: This file defines the login route component for a web application using Remix framework. It includes server-side loaders and actions for authentication, and renders a login form for user sign-in.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Handles server-side data loading for the login route, redirecting authenticated users to the app.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Handles form submission, authenticates user credentials via API, sets auth cookie, and redirects to app.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React component rendering the login form UI, handling user interaction and form submission states.
